entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
